duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare, set up, stock, take down, clean, and provide quality beverages and food products, adhering to all recipe and presentation standards.
Follow recipes to control production and maintain consistency and freshness.
Break down and store all leftover products.
Clean as you go and follow proper daily sanitation checklists.
Maintain all perishables at the proper temperature.
Assist in prep work as required for the next shift.
Assist with inventory and production charts.
Put away stock when necessary, using FIFO (first in, first out).
Set up and break down meeting space and report any items in need of repair.
Follow all safety procedures while working.
